[`init()`](/documentation/cloudkit/cksharerequestaccessoperation/init())Creates a new, empty share request access operation.[`convenience init(shareURLs: [URL])`](/documentation/cloudkit/cksharerequestaccessoperation/init(shareurls:))Creates a share request access operation configured with specified share URLs.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/CloudKit/CKShareRequestAccessOperation#Instance-Properties)

[`var perShareAccessRequestResultBlock: ((URL, Result<Void, any Error>) -> Void)?`](/documentation/cloudkit/cksharerequestaccessoperation/pershareaccessrequestresultblock)A block called once for each share URL processed by the server.[`var shareAccessRequestResultBlock: ((Result<Void, any Error>) -> Void)?`](/documentation/cloudkit/cksharerequestaccessoperation/shareaccessrequestresultblock)A block called when the entire share access request operation completes.[`var shareURLs: [URL]?`](/documentation/cloudkit/cksharerequestaccessoperation/shareurls)The URLs of the shares to request access to.## [Relationships](/documentation/CloudKit/CKShareRequestAccessOperation#relationships)
